name: Ultimate Ninja Frog
description:
Help Ninja Frog to save his family!

A little frog has been transformed into a Ninja frog by a scientist, but the scientist has kidnaped the frog's family! Now you need to save his family from the scientist's army in a dangerous adventure!

Controls:

Walk Left: Left Arrow / A / Left Stick Left

Walk Right: Right Arrow / D / Left Stick Right

Jump: Up Arrow / W /Space /A Button

Credits:

Sprites: Pixel Frog  /  Pixel Frog - itch.io

Coding: DDG  /  DDG - itch.io

Background: GrafxKid / GrafxKid - itch.io

This game was made with the help of  Clécio Espindola GameDev
